name: The Corroded Armlet of Vingt Cinq
data: It increases the users strength impressively.
It increases the users dexterity impressively.
It increases the users constitution impressively.
It has awesome armour class for its type (little in general).
This item loses its magical powers incredibly slowly.
The armlet can be inlaid with up to three shards.
The armlet helps its wearer land more, and more devastating, critical blows.
The armlet increases its wearer's stamina reserves.
